column5: Located next to Pease Park in the neighborhood of Clarksville, my entire apartment is available for you to make your own. It's centrally located, aesthetically-pleasing, and low maintenance. Perfect for a couple, siblings, or friends visiting the city for a few days!  I'm a fellow traveler & have been in your shoes multiple times. Let's make this hassle-free!
column8: Cozy 1/1 Next to Pease Park; Close to Downtown
